content: Is there a way to convert an hir::Visibility to an ast::Visibility?

Why would you need to do that?
Any AST -> HIR conversions are supposed to be one directional.

Ah, I see the comment in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/88019 now.
Whatever the solution is, it certainly doesn't need to convert HIR back to AST.
(I'll look at that PR again in more detail this evening.)
